Summary: Object with simultaneous flashing pink and blue lights over Zephyrhills at night
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Zephyrhills
There were no other sightings in Zephyrhills on or around March 14th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsAt approximately 8:10 pm EDT on March 14, 2012 I was walking home and noticed a large circular object directly overhead with pink and blue lights flashing simultaneously (2 lights total). The object made no sound and flew much faster than any commercial airliner, flying along a straight trajectory, apparently descending until it disappeared over the treetops.
